ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can camp the Knight for 6-8 hours and *maybe* see one tunic dropped.  And you ll have to fight with the high level killstealers that show up to take
ygData.messageBody:
--- Heffleys <heffley@...> wrote:
> Im on the Bertoxx server and Bloodstained Tunics are
> selling for 200pp and up. I group 24-26s can get
> bloodstained tunics and shoulders.

You can camp the Knight for 6-8 hours and *maybe* see
one tunic dropped. And you'll have to fight with the
high level killstealers that show up to take the
Knight away...
===
